description: None of it works. None of it.

Finally a linux app for remarkable! Works great to transfer files. There seems to be some bugs with the inbuit pdf viewer it only shows pdf files. Opening notes taken on remarkable show a blank page. Great start though. Soo glad remarkable finally offers a linux app
summary: Works good but some bugs exist

description: Does not download content from tablet the way it is supposed to. Unable to upload content to tablet either. LiveView has not been implemented. Entirely useless.
